definition: A public event where an individual reads aloud from a written work, often accompanied by commentary or discussion. It is commonly organized in cultural settings, such as bookstores, libraries, or literary festivals, to engage audiences and promote literature.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern eine interessante Lesung besucht.
examples.english: I attended an interesting reading yesterday.

examples.german: Die Autorin wird aus ihrem neuen Buch lesen.
examples.english: The author will read from her new book.

examples.german: Er hat eine Lesung seiner Gedichte veranstaltet.
examples.english: He organized a reading of his poems.
